ValidationRule.description: The Total Cost (excl. GST) must equal the sum of all the Year Costs
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
I_RS_Amount__c <>
(Year_1_Cost__c + Year_2_Cost__c + Year_3_Cost__c + Year_4_Cost__c + Year_5_Cost__c + Year_6_Cost__c + Year_7_Cost__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Total Cost must be equal to the sum of the Year Costs
